e="preserve">Roger Stuart Berlind (June 27, 1930December 18, 2020) was an American theatre producer and businessman. Berlind was born in New York City. He worked for Lehman Brothers. Berlind won fifteen Tony Awards for many of his stage productions. He produced "Amadeus", "The Book of Mormon" and "Guys and Dolls".
Berlind died in New York City on December 18, 2020 of cardiopulmonary arrest at the age of 90.
